exceptions.exn: In environment a : nat -> R x : R H : Rbar_lt (Rabs x) (CV_radius a) H' : R_NormedModule -> Prop Unable to unify "Rbar_lt (Rabs x) (CV_radius a) -> is_derive (PSeries a) x (PSeries (PS_derive a) x)" with "locally (Derive (PSeries a) x) H' -> filtermap (sum_n (fun k : nat => scal (pow_n x k) (INR (S k) * a (S k)))) eventually H'".
Applied theorem does not have enough premises.

original: intros. unfold is_pseries, PS_derive. intros H. apply (is_derive_PSeries a x). apply H.
